title: Street Gang: How We Got to Sesame Street
description:
It's a sunny day on True Story, as Tig and Cheryl take on the joyful and inspiring HBO doc "Street Gang: How We Got to Sesame Street"! From Sunday morning quarterbacking to Anthony Weiner, this episode is as jam-packed and focus-group-tested as an episode of your favorite children's TV show!

*this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

  • Follow the show:
  • Instagram: @tigandcheryltruestory
  • Twitter: @TandCTrueStory


Rate Tig and Cheryl: True Story on Spotify and Apple Podcasts and leave a review for Tig and Cheryl.
